description: Larvia is an innovative startup that emerged from a university project in Ecuador, focusing on the aquaculture sector, particularly shrimp farming. Founded between 2018 and 2020 with support from LANEC Corporation, Larvia leverages artificial intelligence to provide biometric data and analytics, enabling shrimp farmers to make informed decisions. By 2025, the company has expanded its services to 18 countries, aiming to enhance sustainability and efficiency in shrimp production while democratizing access to vital information for farmers.
name: Larvia
